data.paragraph: ECSs can be charged in Yearly/Monthly or Metered mode. You can choose one charging mode based on your requirements.

data.paragraph: In metered mode, ECSs are charged based on usage capacity by hour. If the duration is less than one hour, the system charges for the ECSs based on the actual duration.
